name: mobx-react
description: React bindings for MobX. Create fully reactive components.

3.0.0.name: mobx-react
3.0.0.description: React bindings for mobx. Create fully reactive components.

scripts.build: cp index.js native.js && git apply mobx-react-native.patch
scripts.test: browserify test/*.js | tape-run && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.debug: browserify test/*.js | tape-run --browser chrome

3.3.1.name: mobx-react
3.3.1.description: React bindings for MobX. Create fully reactive components.

scripts.build: cp index.js native.js && git apply mobx-react-native.patch && cp index.js custom.js && git apply mobx-react-custom.patch && cp index.d.ts native.d.ts && cp index.d.ts custom.d.ts
scripts.test: browserify test/*.js | tape-run && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.debug: browserify test/*.js | tape-run --browser chrome

3.4.0-beta.1.name: mobx-react
3.4.0-beta.1.description: React bindings for MobX. Create fully reactive components.

scripts.build: cp index.js native.js && git apply mobx-react-native.patch && cp index.js custom.js && git apply mobx-react-custom.patch && cp index.d.ts native.d.ts && cp index.d.ts custom.d.ts
scripts.test: browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js | tape-run && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.debug: browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js | tape-run --browser chrome

3.5.2-alpha.1.name: mobx-react

scripts.test: npm run build && browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js | tape-run && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.debug: browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js | tape-run --browser chrome
